item.title: Finally, a monitor that displays the XEP80 correctly
item.description:
After playing around with my XEP80, I finally found a monitor that displays the entire XEP80 image, the BMC BM-12AUW Data Display. I inherited this monitor from my grandparents, along with a C64 and two drives. After storing the C64 deep within the dungeon, I tried out the monitor. Here's what the XEP80 running AtariWriter 80 looks like:

Not a bad display at all!
item.dc:creator: gozar
